line: Coming into the room, I see a princess-y blob laying on the bed, seemingly bored.
Without moving, the princess starts to talk.

speaker: Princess
line: "I've felt that you would come. Something happened, haven't it?"

speaker: Maid
line: "Get up, we're leaving this place. At least I hope we are."

speaker: Princess
line: "You have some nerve for a maid, bossing a princess around."

speaker: Princess
line: "But i'm letting this time slide. Something interesting is finally happening."
